name: Default Texture Tank
description:
Tank simulator written originally to be run on a PDP-10 supercomputer, now ported to Unity3D.(1)

Endless enemies are spawning and they all have guns, how long can you stay on top? 

Controls

W-S - forward and back tank movement

A-D - tank rotation

Left-right - turret rotation

Space - shoot

(1) this was actually the first Unity game I cobbled together so it's Pretty Terrible
